code: import axios from"axios";export const sendWhatsAppNotification=async(clientNumber,orderId,estimatedTime)=>{try{const response=await axios.post("https://api.twilio.com/send",{from:"whatsapp:+your_twilio_number",to:"whatsapp:".concat(clientNumber),body:"Your paint mix is in progress! Order No: ".concat(orderId,", ETC: ").concat(estimatedTime," mins. Track via WhatsApp.")});console.log("WhatsApp Notification Sent:",response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error sending WhatsApp message:",error);}};
